title: 'apc: An R Package for Age-Period-Cohort Analysis'
abstract: The apc package includes functions for age-period-cohort analysis based
  on the canonical parametrisation of Kuang et al. (2008a). The package includes functions
  for organizing the data, descriptive plots, a deviance table, estimation of (sub-models
  of) the age-period-cohort model, a plot for specification testing, plots of estimated
  parameters, and sub-sample analysis.
